item.title: Report E-2024120160
item.description:
Report E-2024120160

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-10T12:24:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-16
  • City: CASTLETON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer it was discovered that two pails on a pallet of 16 were leaking from the top. Further investigation revealed that it appeared that freight loaded on top of the pails by the shipper had crushed two of the pail closures damaging them contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as were the damaged pails.

item.title: Report X-2024120412
item.description:
Report X-2024120412

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-26
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN A BULK CART WAGON BY DMP PROCESSING AREA. PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED AND PLACED IN A LINES SPILL TRAY BY A DESIGNATED RESPONDER WEARING FULL PPE (GOGGLES, APRON, GLOVES, BOOTS). PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED.
